{"id":649110513,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1645862810,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/649110513/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxPower(string s) {\n        int cnt = 0;\n        int ma = -1;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size()-1;i++){\n            if(s[i]==s[i+1]){\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            else{\n                ma = max(ma,cnt);\n                cnt = 0;\n            }\n        }\n        ma = max(ma,cnt);\n        return ma+1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
